Room.Name: Garden Circle Road/Ivory Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the end of Ivory Way as it joins Garden Circle Road.
Room.LongDescription: Ivory Way runs along the east side of Kista and borders the city's famous Amphitheater, where many traveling minstrels play nightly. Garden Circle takes you around the great Hanging Gardens momument to the southeast. The Kista Temple of Jinsuti lies to the east. Jinsuti is a high art form of self defense taught to more advanced fighters.
